item.description:
Alright, we're at Molly Malone's again. I do think we're going to have to find a bigger venue soon, though. People, please start e-mailing me suggestions.

Aside from the usual meet and chat stuff, we'll be going over (among other things) some of the information gleaned from the Rolling Hills event with TAPS. It was far more interesting than I expected! Seeya'll there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the guy who looks like my picture.
item.name: The Seacoast Paranormal Research Group June Meeting
